qas.question: What genre of music are bands like Feist and Wilco?
Along with Mumford & Sons, Of Monsters & Men, Ed Sheeran and The Lumineers, what indie artist has had adult contemporary success?
In what decade did indie musicians first began getting attention from the adult contemporary audience?

context: Since the mid-<a2_0>2000s<a2_0/>, the mainstreaming of bands like Wilco and Feist have pushed <a0_0>indie rock<a0_0/> into the adult contemporary conversation. In the early 2010s, indie musicians like <a1_0>Imagine Dragons<a1_0/>, Mumford & Sons, Of Monsters & Men, The Lumineers and Ed Sheeran also had indie songs that crossed over to the adult contemporary charts.
